tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NNP Grandma)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB have) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN birthday)) (ADVP (RB ever)) (NP-TMP (NN tomorrow))) (ADVP (RB !!))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [have/VB nsubj>[Grandma/NNP nmod:poss>My/PRP$] aux>will/MD dobj>[birthday/NN det>the/DT amod>best/JJS advmod>ever/RB nmod:tmod>tomorrow/NN] advmod>!!/RB]
